latex:
The expression $ a^3 - a^{ - 3}$ equals:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \left(a - \frac {1}{a}\right)\left(a^2 + 1 + \frac {1}{a^2}\right) \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ \left(\frac {1}{a} - a\right)\left(a^2 - 1 + \frac {1}{a^2}\right)$\\
$ \textbf{(C)}\ \left(a - \frac {1}{a}\right)\left(a^2 - 2 + \frac {1}{a^2}\right) \qquad\textbf{(D)}\ \left(\frac {1}{a} - a\right)\left(a^2 + 1 + \frac {1}{a^2}\right)$\\
$ \textbf{(E)}\ \text{none of these}$
